thread.title: Damian Lillard is showing off his absurd handles and passing vs. the Thunder
thread.title_full: Damian Lillard is showing off his absurd handles and passing vs. the Thunder

author: Tim Cato
title: Damian Lillard is showing off his absurd handles and passing vs. the Thunder
text:
These plays were ridiculous.
It’s one of those nights for Damian Lillard , where he’s willing to shatter any ankle he comes across and embarrass anyone who gets in his way. Here he is with impeccable handles that you really can’t do anything about.
We counted 4 behind-the-back dribbles on this @Dame_Lillard move #RipCity pic.twitter.com/mudGHS4cu6 
— NBA.com (@NBAcom) March 3, 2017 There’s more, with a blink-and-you’ll-miss-it underhanded rocket pass. This is really nuts.
I’m honestly looking out for you, defenders, when I say be very careful tonight if you see Lillard approaching. That is, if you are the sort of player who doesn’t appreciate getting roasted and the part of his highlights for thousands of internet users.
